text: We have revealed allegations that this image shows the democratic presidential candidate Pitto Orroc with El Chapo and that it is almost naked in words such as "hot" and "bitch" on his body. He wants to be your boss in 2020." This article was referred to as part of Facebook's efforts to combat false news and misleading information in its news broadcast. ∙ (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.) "After listening to your last album I'd say you're very worthy of the presidency," hung one of the fans. ==History==Factcheck.org spoke to Alex G, whose real name is Alexander Gianascully, and said that the picture was taken behind the scenes at a show in New York City in 2017 after he poured beer on his pants.
